finalProject.collaboration: Master Thesis: Colaboration with Volkswagen Group, Germany
finalProject.description: Investigate and write a research paper about technological countermeasures to passive fatique in drivers.

finalProject.collaboration: Final Project: Colaboration with Treat Systems A/S, Denmark
finalProject.description: Design the main product Treat Essential to various platforms. The architecture must handle huge volume of data, while granting large scale concept, being fully testable and maintainable over time.

finalProject.collaboration: Final Project: Colaboration with Betfray A/S, Denmark
finalProject.description: Design and implement of a new module for a social-betting platform, consisting in 1-vs-1 challenges and many-to-many competitions rewarded by real prizes, set by the company's sponsors.
